entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening then changing to periods of ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. High 6. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then clearing. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
